name: FunTimes
0:
”Alexa, fun times”
”Alexa, start fun times”
”Alexa, play fun times”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fun times
des:
I ask you multiplication questions and your level goes up with 8 correct answers.
10 points with a correct answer.
1,000 points with a level up.
1,500 points with a gold.

Say "Set Table 3" to get questions only in 3 times table.
Say "Set Table 7" to get questions only in 7 times table, and etc.

You have privileges in Master level.
A gold with 8 correct answers in Master level.

Challenge how far you can achieve!


Say "Question" to know current question.
Say "Gold" to know current gold amount.
Say "Level" to know current your level.
Say "Score" to know current your score.
Say "Random" to get random questions.
Say "Restart" to reset your score, level and gold, then to start from the beginning.


Say "Stop" to quit.
Say "Help" to get help messages.

Enjoy the game and enhance your Times Table memory!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
